item.title: Managing AWS Autoscaling Groups and Load Balancers using Terraform
item.description: It’s good to have a basic terraform code that deploys a basic environment on AWS whenever you need to run some quick tests on a free tier account. We’ll have the following resources deployed with this procedure: 1 VPC 2 Subnets 1 Internet Gateway 1 Route Table (with a default route and an association) 2 Security groups 1 Key Pair 1 EC2 Instance 1 Launch Configuration 1 ELB 1 ASG 2 Autoscaling Policies 2 Cloudwatch Metric Alarms It’s a very simple and you can build on top of it according to your needs, like the previou infrastructure.
